janapriyathwayata path prawina chyothishawedinge nam – gam yoda ganimin mahajanathawa nomanga yawima sandaha sanwidhanathmaka katakatha kalliyak kriyathmaka wana baw anawaranaya weyi.rajya nayakayan saha deshapalanagnyayin, janapriya pudgalayin ge athishaya rahasigatha paudgalika jiwitha pilibanda anawaki pala karana bawa kiyamin pathuruwa harina katakatha perala  mada web adawi kihipayakin nawatha pracharaya karawima mangin ee thorathuru sathya bawa eeththu ganwimata me katakatha kalliya kriyathmaka wana bawath dana gannata atha.merata prakata chyothishawediyaku ki anawakiyak bawa huwa dakwamin pasugiyada ekthara prawruththiyak web adawiyaka pala kara thibu athara adala chyothishawediya siluminata prakasha kara sitiye meya thama nama yoda ganimin kala asathya pracharayak bawath thaman kisi witeka ewani anawakiyak prakasha kara nathi bawathya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

wishwa widyalayehi ganithaya wishaya pilibanda aacharyawarayek, ganithaya pilibanda aacharyawarayek wana demawpiyek, ganitha wishaya pilibanda adhyakshawarayek, ganithaya pilibanda ihala mattame palapurudu guruwarayek, guru upadeshakayek, jathika adhyapana aayathanaye ganithaya pilibanda aacharya warayek (demala), departhamenthuwe ganithaya pilibanda pa්rawina komasaris warayek yana 7 denaku gen ema kamituwa samanwitha wenawa.mema widwath kamituwa mangin pa්rashna patha්rayata labadi athi kalaya pa්ramanawath da, emagin shishyayanta badhawak wi da, wishaya nirdeshaye adangu nowana karunak adangu wi thibuna da, pa්rashnawala ganithamaya dosha ath da aadi karunu gana mema pirisa soya balanawa.mita amatharawa kalaya pilibanda pa්rashnayak wuye nam uththara patha්ra lakunu kirime di anugamanaya kala yuthu ki්raya patipatiya nirdesha kirimata thawath wishesha kamituwak path kara thiyenawa.mema kamitu 2 magin ganitha wishayata peni siti kisidu shishyayakuta awasiyak ho asadharanayak nowana aakarayata ha samanya pela wibhagaye pa්ramithiya rakena paridi thiranayak ganimata ki්raya karanawa.wishaya mala sakas kirima ho eya sama pasalakama mula sita aga thek iganwuwa da yanna sewima ape karyayak noweyi.
